TEXT.TITLE: INVESTOR HAS TECHNOLOGY DEVELOPMENT <TDCX> STAKE
TEXT.BODY: Leon Greenblatt, a Chicago investor, told the Securities and Exchange Commission he has acquired 89,450 shares of Technology Development Corp, or 5.3 pct of the total outstanding common stock. Greenblatt said he bought the stock for 350,000 dlrs soley as an investment and has no intention of seeking control of the company. Reuter
